programme.desc: Updates on how author Ann Rule helped a woman prove that her daughter was killed.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.sub-title: Teenage Terror and The East Mountain Murders
programme.desc: When three high-schoolers are gunned down in their car, police launch an investigation into why they came to such a violent end; ten years later, that investigation reaches a dramatic conclusion in an Albuquerque courtroom.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Girly Chew had been worried about her safety; the investigation into her disappearance would take police into a world of aliens and reptiles, cancer cures and cannibalism, a world inhabited by a charismatic conman and his extra-terrestrial soul-mate.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: After leaving a work party late at night, Ramona Krotinea's body gets discovered in the trunk of her own car the next day, and police need to reconstruct who and what happened in the intervening hours.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Rosemarie Essa appears to die in a car crash; when police learn this was no more than a low-speed fender bender, they begin to suspect foul play by someone who knew what they were doing.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Ashley Biggs thought it was just another pizza delivery, and didn't know who was waiting on the other end; she didn't come back, and police found the delivery address abandoned, with a pool of blood on the ground.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When teenager Dennis Lewis is killed fighting off home invaders, all police have to go on is a single handprint; when lab results reveal who the print belongs to, no one wants to believe it.

programme.title: VPI: Vinnie Politan Investigates
programme.desc: Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the true crime stories that are captivating the world over.

programme.title: Opening Statements With Julie Grant
programme.desc: Former prosecutor Julie Grant is joined by a team of top trial attorneys and forensic experts to cover the high-stakes trials that are on the docket, and the crime cases dominating the headlines.
